languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс со вздохом встает и подходит к вам.{/n} "Прошу, не надо... теперь ты наказываешь меня за то, что я сказал вслух то, что ты не хотела слышать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс со вздохом встает и подходит к вам.{/n} "Прошу, не надо... теперь ты наказываешь меня за то, что я сказал вслух то, что ты не хотела слышать".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс со вздохом встает и подходит к вам.{/n} "Прошу, не надо... теперь ты наказываешь меня за то, что я сказал вслух то, что ты не хотела слышать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."
{n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."
{n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."
{n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."

languages.text: {n}海因里希叹了口气，站起身来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“求求你，不要这样……你是在惩罚我，因为我大声说出了你不想听的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希叹了口气，站起身来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“求求你，不要这样……你是在惩罚我，因为我大声说出了你不想听的话。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se levanta con un suspiro y se acerca a ti.{/n} «Por favor no me haga esto... me está castigando por decir algo que no quería oír».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se levanta con un suspiro y se acerca a ti.{/n} «Por favor no me haga esto... me está castigando por decir algo que no quería oír».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはため息をつきながら立ち上がり、あなたに近づく。{/n}「頼む、こんなことしないでくれ…あなたは、聞きたくないことを声高に言った俺を罰しているんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはため息をつきながら立ち上がり、あなたに近づく。{/n}「頼む、こんなことしないでくれ…あなたは、聞きたくないことを声高に言った俺を罰しているんだ」

languages.text: {n}Avec un soupir, Heinrix se lève et s'approche de vous.{/n} « Ne faites pas ça, s'il vous plaît... Ne me punissez pas pour avoir dit ce que vous ne vouliez pas entendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un soupir, Heinrix se lève et s'approche de vous.{/n} « Ne faites pas ça, s'il vous plaît... Ne me punissez pas pour avoir dit ce que vous ne vouliez pas entendre. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix steht auf, seufzt und kommt dir näher.{/n} "Bitte, tut das nicht ... Ihr bestraft mich dafür, dass ich laut ausspreche, was Ihr nicht hören wolltet."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix steht auf, seufzt und kommt dir näher.{/n} "Bitte, tut das nicht ... Ihr bestraft mich dafür, dass ich laut ausspreche, was Ihr nicht hören wolltet."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, iç çekerek ayağa kalkıyor ve sana yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Lütfen bunu yapma... Duymak istemediğin şeyi yüksek sesle söylediğim için beni cezalandırıyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gets to his feet with a sigh and draws close to you.{/n} "Please, don't do this... You are punishing me for saying aloud what you didn't want to hear."
